    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BloodyMage
     
    ClassType
     
    Consumable
    Represents a consumable item that can be used by the hero, such as potions that apply temporary effects.
    CrimsonArcher
     
    Entity
    Represents a base game entity.
    GameHelper
    Utility class containing helper methods for displaying game-related messages, dividers and maps.
    Hero
    Represents a player-controlled hero.
    Item
    Represents a generic item that can be used or purchased in the game, such as consumables or weapons.
    ItemType
     
    Legionnaire
     
    Main
     
    NPC
     
    Quest
    Centralizes all quest logic, battles and narrative flows of the game.
    RedBastion
     
    Riddle
    Represents a riddle containing a question, multiple answer options and the correct answer.
    Shop
    Represents an in-game shop where heroes can buy items such as consumables and weapon upgrades.
    Tavern
    Represents the tavern hub where the hero can interact with multiple game systems such as shop, gambling and quests.
    Weapons
    Represents a weapon item that can increase a hero's attack and may be restricted to a specific hero class.
